comment.body:
Wczoraj wieczorem jak sprawdzałem, to u mnie problem z logowaniem był nawet z wyłączonym AdGuardem.
Wyglądało to w ten sposób, że czasami po zalogowaniu pokazywało, że jestem nadal niezalogowany.
Co któreś odświeżenie strony (bez podawania danych do logowania) wyświetlało, że jestem zalogowany, a po kolejnym odświeżeniu już nie, tak w kółko.
Dzisiaj już nie potrafię tego odtworzyć i logowanie działa prawidłowo nawet z włączonym AdGuardem.

@FadeMind Nadal masz problem z logowaniem?

comment.body:
Фильтр раздражителей блокирует данный чат, поскольку он сторонний.
Можно выключить этот фильтр и настроить блокировку более гибче, используя наши новые фильтры в категории раздражителей. Среди новых только не стоит включать фильтр виджетов для этого случая.

labels.name: A: Problematic

issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: Link-tracking in Google Search results
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

Now we have a conversion of links and, as a result, link-tracking in Google search results.

### Proposed solution

To solve this problem, I use a third-party script that looks like deprecated:
https://github.com/Rob--W/dont-track-me-google

Is it possible to add a native solution to the filtering rules or antitracking/stealth modules?🤲🏼

Thank you.
Best regards!

### Additional information

_No response_

issue.title: Duplicate entries in AdGuard Base Filter (N: uBlock Origin) (T: Filesize)
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBO 1.44.2

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

chrome-extension://cjpalhdlnbpafiamejdnhcphjbkeiagm/asset-viewer.html?url=adguard-generic

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. The following 35 entries in AdGuard Base Filter's 2.2.47.7 uBO version seem to have duplicates of them, i.e. they each show up twice in the list:

```
##.commercial-unit-mobile-bottom
@@||pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js$domain=simsdom.com
@@||pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js$domain=uploadbank.com
```

comment.body:
Hi @BlazDT, "I don't care about cookies" author here.

I'm not sure about what the issue is. Just tested it, it works fine on my side: I can manually click the `Einverstanden` button if the IDCAC filter list is active and `/wrapperMessagingWithoutDetection.js` being blocked (the pop-up gets dismissed and I can see the page content).

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://doramalive.ru/dorama/vedma/player/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdoramalive.ru%2Fdorama%2Fvedma%2Fplayer%2F) ### Comment Username: @kuchacoda > Здравствуйте. Помогите пожалуйста решить проблему конфликтов фильтра AdGuard Russian FIlter. > Мы уже неоднократно замечали, что это правило ломает плеер в определенных случаях: > > /:\/\/([a-z-]{6}\.)?(?!aniqit)[a-z0-9]{4,}\.(com|in\.net|link|tech|ru)/$xmlhttprequest,domain=aniqit.com|kodik.info|start.u-cdn.top|ustore.bz|u-stream.in > > В этоп правиле домены плеера это только aniqit.com и kodik.info. Остальные это уже другие плееры и не знаю почему они все в одном правиле. > > Суть в том, что при определенном стечении обстоятельств (возможно это зависит от конкретного поддомена CDN, который отдается при скачивании видео) блокировщик рекламы блокирует не только рекламу, но и само видео. > > Вообще данное правило лично для меня выглядит очень сложным и я не до конца понимаю как оно рабоатет, но мне кажется именно домены aniqit.com и kodik.info можно из него спокойно убрать, так как вся реклама в плеере Kodik блокируется множеством других правил. А конкретно это правило я видел только в случаях, когда пользователи жаловались на то, что у них не работает плеер (и у самого также случались такие проблемы). > > Буду очень благодарен, если вы можете решить данную проблему. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/9y5AJzy.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/fzQQIQt.jpg)
Screenshot 3 ![Screenshot 3](https://reports-img.adguard.com/07hZryj.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- Platform: | uBlock Origin AdGuard Russian Filter Browser: | Firefox Filters: | Language-specific:
AdGuard Russian

comment.body:
Hi,
This website often updates their anti-adblock script - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra/issues/289

It looks like that now it's geo-locked (I have to use VPN to open it) and it seems that anti-adblock message is basing on timezone (not only), but in this case it doesn't matter if ad blocker is enabled or not, anti-adblock notice is displayed anyway.
These rules:
```adblock
rjno1.com#@#[id^="aswift_"]
||stat.zol.com.cn/adrs/ol.js$redirect=noopjs,domain=rjno1.com
rjno1.com#%#(function(){const b=function(d){const a=Math.pow(10,d-1),b=Math.pow(10,d);return Math.floor(Math.random()*(b-a)+a)}(12);window.addEventListener("load",function(){window.google_image_requests=[],window.google_global_correlator=b,window._hmt=window._hmt||[],_hmt.id=b})})();
rjno1.com#%#AG_onLoad(function(){var a=document.body,b=document.createElement("div");a&&(a.appendChild(b),b.setAttribute("id","aswift_1"))});
rjno1.com#%#//scriptlet("prevent-addEventListener", "error", "event.target.tagName")
```
should fix anti-adblock (at least work on my end).
This rule:
```adblock
rjno1.com#%#(()=>{Date.prototype.getTimezoneOffset=function(){return 180};})();
```
should fixes detection based on timezone, but it rather shouldn't be added.

@Alex-302 I suppose that it would be better to move this issue to Extra repo?

pull_request.title: Update bilibili.com URL tracking parameter
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request > Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\ > If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\ > It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/en/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\ > Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it ## Prerequisites ### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms - [x] This is not an ad/bug report; - [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project; - [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes; - [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure. ## What problem does the pull request fix? ### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section - [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers; - [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly; - [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website; - [ ] Missed analytics or tracker; - [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc; - [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc; - [x] Filters maintenance. ## What issue is being fixed? Added rules for removing newly added tracking parameters (after #99685) ### Enter the issue address N/A ### Add your comment and screenshots #### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located 0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\ Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\ Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content; 1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard Use `
` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler; 2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know. **Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots! 1. Your comment 2. Screenshots
Screenshot 1:
Screenshot 2:
### Terms - [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://www.turkceyamaci.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.turkceyamaci.com%2F) ### Comment > Merhaba, bu site zararlı yazılım İÇERİYOR! Birçok kişi bu site yüzünden mağdur. AdGuard olarak bu siteyi güvenlik filtrenize eklemenizi kesinlikle öneririm. İsterseniz denemek isterseniz deneyebilirsiniz ancak önermem. > > Bu sitenin amacı nedir? > > Bu site, sözde Türkçe olmayan oyunları Türkçe dil yaması yayınlıyor gibi yapıyor ancak çoğu içeriği zararlı yazılım içeriyor, genellikle mining virüsü oluyor bunun türü. Kısacası scam bir sitedir. > > KANIT: > > https://forum.donanimhaber.com/turkce-yamaci-sitesi-virus-deposu--143202132 > > https://www.technopat.net/sosyal/konu/tuerkce-yamaci-sitesinden-virues-bulasti.1548260/ > > https://www.technopat.net/sosyal/konu/sahte-tuerkce-yama-sitesi.744930/ > > https://uzmanim.net/soru/turkce-yamaci-sitesi-guvenilir-mi/110638 > > https://www.sikayetvar.com/turkce-yamaci > > https://www.sikayetvar.com/turkce-yamaci/yama > > https://www.technopat.net/sosyal/konu/turkceyamaci-comu-sikayet-ettim-uzak-durun.1053241/ > > https://www.technopat.net/sosyal/konu/tuerkce-yamaci-sitesi-virues-deposu.907942/ > > https://www.technopat.net/sosyal/konu/tuerkce-yamaci-guevenli-mi.1635343/ > > https://www.technopat.net/sosyal/konu/tuerkce-yama-icin-turkceyamaci-guevenli-mi.1910144/ > > https://www.sikayetvar.com/turkce-yamaci/turkce-yamaci-yamalarin-hepsi-viruslu > > English translate: > > Hello, this site CONTAINS malware! Many people suffer because of this site. As AdGuard, I highly recommend adding this site to your security filter.
